name: rabblerouser-core-e2e
description: A pluggable, extensible membership database for community organising

scripts.acceptanceTestsStaging: NODE_ENV=test PHANTOMJS_EXECUTABLE=phantomjs casperjs --web-security=true --log-level=debug --verbose test spec/acceptance/user_journey.js spec/acceptance/admin_journey.js --url=https://lab-assistant-staging.herokuapp.com --email=$ACCEPTANCE_EMAIL --password=$ACCEPTANCE_PASSWORD | grep -v 'Unsafe JavaScript attempt to access frame' | grep -v -e '^$'
scripts.prep-data: NODE_ENV=test node ../backend/node_scripts/e2e-seed/teardown.js && NODE_ENV=test node ../backend/node_scripts/e2e-seed/admin.js && NODE_ENV=test node ../backend/node_scripts/e2e-seed/branch-and-organiser.js
scripts.e2e: NODE_ENV=test PHANTOMJS_EXECUTABLE=phantomjs casperjs --web-security=true --disk-cache=true --log-level=info --verbose test tmp/test-bundle.js --url=http://localhost:3000 | grep -v 'Unsafe JavaScript attempt to access frame' | grep -v -e '^$'
